coordinateSystem: UI-space only. Origin is top-left of viewport; x grows right, y grows down.
objective: Break his confidence. Threat pressure makes him crack.
hint: He acts hard, but fear wins if you push him.

historyTail.content: I need the code. Help me and we both walk away safe.
You want results? Push harder and prove you mean it.
